params.name: raw
params.description: When set to true the promise will resolve with the request object

description: Implicit OAuth flow using a pop-up.

unknown.tagValue: {void}

params.name: callbackUrl
params.description:
callbackUrl for obtaining the token. This should be a
                              page with this script on it. If left empty the current
                              url will be used.

params.name: windowOptions
params.description: optional window options for the pop-up window

unknown.tagValue: {String} - window.name of the created pop-up

return.description: window.name of the created pop-up

name: localStorageKey
description: localStorage key name for temporarily storing the token

unknown.tagValue: {String} - key name

return.description: key name

unknown.tagValue: {Promise} - Promise resolves with {@link OAuthToken} and rejects with {@link OAuthError}

return.description: Promise resolves with {@link OAuthToken} and rejects with {@link OAuthError}

name: save
description: Store the token for later recovery. Token will be stored in HTTPS cookie if possible.

unknown.tagValue: {void}

params.name: forceLocalStorage
params.description: force the token to be stored in the localStorage

description: Recover a token by looking through the HTTPS cookies and localStorage

unknown.tagValue: {OAuthToken|null} - null if none could be recovered
